text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
I feel great
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since yesterday?
I added Redux for our test app, and failed to use AutoDevOps with GitLab. However, as our react app will need SSR anyway, it doesn't really matter too much. I also considered Next as our SSR, which will require some reconfiguration of the test app. I also read up on which communication platform to use, I decided to test with fetch, as it is the standard. For the sideeffects (fetch) we'll need either redux-saga or trunk. I also read up on Go for Webservices
attachments.text: I added Redux for our test app, and failed to use AutoDevOps with GitLab. However, as our react app will need SSR anyway, it doesn't really matter too much. I also considered Next as our SSR, which will require some reconfiguration of the test app. I also read up on which communication platform to use, I decided to test with fetch, as it is the standard. For the sideeffects (fetch) we'll need either redux-saga or trunk. I also read up on Go for Webservices
attachments.title: What did you do since yesterday?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
Today I will setup the dockerfile for the nextjs test app. Hopefully with deployment
attachments.text: Today I will setup the dockerfile for the nextjs test app. Hopefully with deployment
attachments.title: What will you do today?

attachments.pretext:
Participation: *50%*
Keep up the good work! :tada:
